# Draft:Wow, a Talking Fish

Wow, a Talking Fish! is an animated short film by the Armenian animator Robert Sahakyants. It was published in 1983 with the title () bringing to life in a beautiful way a story written by Hovhannes Tumanyan.
Plot
The plot shows us the story of a lonely fisherman that manages to capture a talking fish, instead of killing it for food or selling it to a merchant, our protagonist decides to free the talking fish, this selfless act of human kindness summons a shapeshifting wizard. The fisherman and the wizard engage in a fabulous conversation that circles the themes of mercy and moral, while the fantastic creature continues to change his appearance in the most psychodelic ways.
Animation
The animation style depicted in this short film is clearly very experimental.
